body: Responsibilities: -installing and configuring computer hardware operating systems and applications; -replacing parts as required ;-monitoring and maintaining computer systems and networks; -talking staff/clients through a series of actions, either face to face or over the telephone to help set up systems or resolve issues ;-providing support, including procedural documentation and relevant reports; - document each ticket with a level of detail to enable other support teams to effectively pick up the issue when it is escalated;-supporting the roll-out of new applications ;-setting up new users' accounts and profiles and dealing with password issues; -prioritizing and managing many open cases at one time, escalating issues if necessary to higher support levels; -managing access for employees to company resources : applications, policies; -handling inventory for hardware and software;Profile:- student or University Graduate (Technical University Degree is a plus) ;- 2 years of related work experience, or an equivalent combination of education and experience; - experience in the use of remote IT support tools ;- good knowledge of Microsoft Operating Systems local and remote administration;- good knowledge of the Microsoft Office family applications (especially Excel); - AD experience, managing systems integrated in AD domain, creating and managing users and groups, group and access policies and permissions; - proficiency in English language ;- excellent customer service skills; - excellent troubleshooting capability ;- strong analytical, technical, problem solving and organizational skills ;- process and procedure oriented ;- Linux and Apple support experience;- able to communicate problems/issues to customers in a non-technical manner ;- very good communication skills; - strong analytical, technical, problem solving and organizational skills ;- team player, self motivated, organized, detail oriented and able to handle changing priorities;
title: IT Support Specialist
locations: Bucuresti sector 6, București, Municipiul București, România
